website_summaries.verdict: Apple's 10.5-inch iPad Pro tablet packs as much power as a laptop, but using iOS for pro-level applications will take some getting used to for many professionals.
pros: Better battery life than previous iPads
cons: Using iOS for pro-level applications requires a shift in thinking
Screen technologies may be too advanced to perceive

customer_reviews.title: Screen frozen and cannot take any action.
customer_reviews.text: The iPad has some big issues with rotating the screen and the screen freezes, then you can’t simply do anything for a few minutes even if you press the home/ lock button. I have tried to contact the seller to ask about the guaranty and nobody emailed back.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Rotaru

customer_reviews.title: US Charger
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the graphics, speed, extra memory and greater functionality compared with my old iPad 4. However, I was surprised and disappointed that it was supplied with a US charger, so I had to go out and buy a British one which partly reduced some of the saving that I made by making the purchase via Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: genialhero43

customer_reviews.title: Superb price, fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect new product, significantly cheaper than apple shop. Fast delivery. Only downside was USB plug to go into the mains was US one. It did come with a uk socket plug BUT it has no USB connector. Made no difference to me as it did come with the lightning USB cable that I connected to my wall socket USB. As I say perfect product and delivered quickly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: W. Langley

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, excellent service.
customer_reviews.text: I’m an Apple fan and was upgrading from an iPad Air 2 but straightaway I was pleased I’d upgraded. It’s got a slightly bigger screen and that improves the user experience. The supplier kept me informed of progress throughout and added a UK plug for the charger. Excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: Spcp

customer_reviews.title: Good for oldie
customer_reviews.text: Having been a 30 year Microsoft man, the transition to apple has been a little difficult, but well worth the time and hassle to learn it’s idiosyncrasies. Now I am happy with the format, the screen and the system. The portability is great and the size a good compromise. any smaller and my ageing eyes would battle, bigger and it would be an issue in carrying it about. So a winner that beats my wife’s surface pro hands down.
customer_reviews.author: vousmous

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Fast, a pleasure to use, fun to use with an Apple pencil, sound quality far better than any iPads I've had previously. Love it and love the size. Glad I treated myself.
customer_reviews.author: Faithful Alfred

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as described. The ipad is much quicker than the previous one and the battery lasts far longer than in previous ipads. The battery takes only a short period to charge. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Scobie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I can’t put this down. Apple has products are simply the best! What I like most is the fact that I can use it as a note book. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hummy15

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good seller.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is delighted with this, and this seller provided very good value. Also good customer service - they replied quickly to a pre-order query, and the iPad arrived much more quickly than Amazon said it would. I can't comment on the iPad itself, as it's my daughter's birthday present, but initial reaction is 100% positive (she especially liked the way it copied all her settings automatically from her iPhone!).
customer_reviews.author: C. Watson-brown

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It came a day early! Am really pleased with this IPad, great value and great service. It was easy to set up once I had logged on to the Internet via my pc. I am looking forward to using it. So much better than the old one!
customer_reviews.author: Wrinkle2

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: **Black Friday Deal** With an amazing price at £448 I couldn’t pass up the opportunity to own this iPad Pro! I’m so glad I purchased this, I upgraded from an iPad mini 2 and the difference is staggering. Seamlessly able to navigate this iPad and it works like a charm, it also arrived in immaculate condition. This one will surely last me for years to come at 256GB too! Thanks Amazon x
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs improvement to iPad OS
customer_reviews.text: This was an upgrade to my iPad Air, which is a bit slow now and has no iOS upgrade anymore. Software is not much different to previous but now you can use a mouse but is clunky. iPad is very fast even for a 2017 model similar to my iPhone 8. Screen is lovely @120Hz, crisp, clear images and very bright. Better than current iPad Air 3. iPad OS is the problem it needs to be more like a desktop rather than an phone OS. If this changes I will not need to use my laptop as much. Great hardware shame software needs improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Coolcube

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Third iPad and fastest, slimmest and lightest one yet
customer_reviews.author: Michael P Owen

customer_reviews.title: Slim and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my old iPad 3 this has ten times the storage, is noticeably faster, brighter and lighter in weight. Photographs are much clearer and it has more functions. One of these is the Live Photo feature where once the photo is taken one touch causes it to come alive for a few seconds. The large memory permits storage of loads of photos Bluetooth communication with EarPods is really good whilst watching films or listening to music. All in all I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy when I bought this ipad during the black Friday sale and it cost over 300 pounds less than usual. The 10.5-inch ipad is a bit bigger than the 9.7-inch ipad I used before , giving a better look without being as bulky as the 12.9-inch ipad. It has four speakers take better acoustics. The rear camera also has a much better pixel count than before. I hope apple company will continue to make better products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Simply needed an upgrade. Arrived very quickly. Easy to set up, very fast. Slightly heavier than expected but once again Apple have produced excellent machine.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan muir Mclaren

customer_reviews.title: Never again!
customer_reviews.text: ipads are always good but this one plays up, it freezes when you magnify the screen, issues when trying to reboot it too. I will never purchase outside of the apple store again
customer_reviews.author: Papa Bear

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced my iPad 3 with this new iPad Pro. I ordered yesterday afternoon and received this morning. Original item and UK charger included. Didn’t have to go to the Apple Store and wait. I saved money. Many thanks ‘INT Impex‘ for prompt delivery! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AndreA

customer_reviews.title: My third iPad!
customer_reviews.text: An improvement on my last one! Good battery life, easy to use. Some interesting extra apps. The finger print scan is a little bit hit and miss. Compared to my earlier iPads the sound on this isn’t bad. No not hifi maybe but ok to listening to my Audible collection. All in all very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: JillyB

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love? Fast, beautiful screen, good sound quality. I will be using it a lot for music and photography, so perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Apple Ipad Pro 10.5" Rose Gold
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with Ipad Pro 10.5". Lovely to use and quicker than old Ipad. Battery life lasts longer too. Pretty colour although now hidden under cover. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: S. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived ok but uk plug was taped to box difficult to wrap as it is for a present
customer_reviews.author: James A MacKinnon

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lightweight replacement
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace an older iPad. Very happy with the features. Bought an apple pen as well so can draw pictures etc on the screen. Great for using to make study notes. Very lightweight. Really pleased with the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Coujie

customer_reviews.title: Apple iPad Pro
customer_reviews.text: The build quality is okay and has plenty of features to play around with. Dissapointed with the graphics as sometimes on moving objects the colours appear smeared. Will just have to put up with it. Next time I will make sure to view it in store before I buy again. Considerring the cost even though it was discounted I was expecting alot better quality from Apple.
customer_reviews.author: nidge

customer_reviews.title: Love it..
customer_reviews.text: Just love this tablet..I have the 12.9 inch pro which is great but a bit bulky to travel with..my old standard iPad was so slow I needed to replace it..along come Black Friday and this 10.5 pro was only slightly more than basic iPad..astonishing price from amazon..paid £450 for it..a week later it was £780..great price and product
customer_reviews.author: Piggy

customer_reviews.title: Happy, happy, happy
customer_reviews.text: A very happy wife, Loves the product, it is just what was expected. Delivery was fast and a very efficient service, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great value, still performs
customer_reviews.text: Was able to pick a 512Gb version up as a black Friday special. With iOS 13 I'm getting closer to being able to leave my laptop at home. Unless you are an avid gamer or maybe video editor, the performance of these"older" iPads is still excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Syrup1971

customer_reviews.title: Ipad pro 10.5
customer_reviews.text: Had this for Christmas after my last ipad 4th Generation started to fail. Not disappointed as its an upgrade with 512 memory, has good sound and great screen. Will be watching downloaded films on the plane again this year
customer_reviews.author: rescueman

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I was considering buying the latest iPad Air (2019) and read a review which showed the older iPad Pro was a much better choice. I got a good discount around Black Friday time and I'm very pleased with this model, not least with its 256GB capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Man

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Got the newer model to replace my old iPad and it's a vast improvement. I particularly like the Apple Pen drawing ability, the blue light filter and the new interface with the drop down menu. I got mine brand new from a different seller at a slightly cheaper cost so I'm happy all around.
customer_reviews.author: Kleio

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much very pleased and happy with it it arrived yesterday and I have been getting used to it all in all very happy and pleased with it yes I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Worth

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant price I love the i pad pro, so many functions, my laptop is obsolete now. Love the rose gold colour. Very fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: V15

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the Black Friday price . . .
customer_reviews.text: Bought during the “Black Friday” promotion at a very good price. Simple to setup and easy to use if you’re familiar with the Apple product range. Just hope that Apple continue to support this discontinued model for a few more years so the iOS for iPad can be updated.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic customer service, delivery early and the product is exceptional. Really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Wini

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for digital artists and beyond
customer_reviews.text: Cannot fault this product, it arrived in a brand new condition, no marks or scratches, the quality of the display is by far better than any other of my devices, it's super fast, portable and the speaker is of very good quality. I brought this product primarily to make digital art, however I'll be surprised if I dont now use this device for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: Got this as phone too small to do course work and didn’t want a laptop. Battery life not great but just keep charging it up. Really like it but need to learn more about it as not tech savvy yet.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Worth the upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This is an upgrade to the pro from a 9.7in. Comes into its own with the Apple Pencil that I use for extensive note taking and with the Nebo app excellent conversion of handwriting to text. Love the extra screen dimension and four speakers for watching film etc..
customer_reviews.author: RobMax

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money at a discounted price!
customer_reviews.text: A bargain for 256GB storage! Laminated screen which avoids a bit of reflection makes some difference. The real issue is the black bars when watching any kind of video. From YouTube to iPlayer to Prime Video, you lose real screen estate.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Bah

customer_reviews.title: Really Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: This beautifully sleek iPad works so easily. Set up is smooth and there is a lot of help available through the guides etc... Really glad I made the purchase moving to Apple from not-Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Eggtimer

customer_reviews.title: Original product. Everything sealed in original.
customer_reviews.text: Original product . Everything sealed in original. Work so smooth and the colours are so bright
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: disappointed with faulty ipad
customer_reviews.text: would not allow set up took to Mac shack to do it ,cost £35. it worked for a short time and then would not find any networks or blue tooth, back to Mac shack they tried but no good diagnosed hardware fault, cost another £15, returned to amazon on 5th october still havent recieved my money £ 559.99 , and still £50 out of pocket
customer_reviews.author: no1topcat

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Although the new version is on market already, I am not restless to upgrade to the new A4 size, because this is just so handy, smooth and sexy. Idk if apple plays game while updating ios software and make old version work slow (everyone knows thiS) otherwise, I recommend this pad. Cheers!!
customer_reviews.author: All Ok

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Broke within less than 3 months. Amazon accepted a return but then we struggled to get the refund processed. Will buy from new in future. A shame as it was great whilst it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love the colour
customer_reviews.text: Lovely iPad, love the colour, all the new features (which are too many to list and I am still trying to figure out). The iPad Pro is lighter than my old one. I am loving my journey of discovery.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K. F. Gore

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended, but I only bought it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended, but I only bought it to communicate with people who only use this. this I am really a laptop sort of person.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. Walton

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to have bought this product. It is fabulous. Great quality and design with a good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: chocolatetoozik

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace my iPad 4 because it’s about 5years old and keeps freezing and a bit slow. Purchased on a Black Friday deal, much faster, huge Memory, a bit bigger. Was expecting a useless American charger after reading past reviews but got an English one... bonus 😊.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Rankin

customer_reviews.title: iPad Pro 10.5
customer_reviews.text: I use my iPad every day to check email, shopping and my brother’s accounts. Love my iPad so light and easy to use for everything even game’s
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Battery life and overall performance is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, I've never had an Ipad before going for the cheaper ones but this is just the best , battery life is really long and I use it all the time at work and personal. Would never have another android tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: older model but fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: lighting deal beats everyone else at this price. great price fast dispatch you get the item pictured great value genuine original item
customer_reviews.author: Alderney Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived brand new in great condition, love the iPad Pro!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for personal use and studying rather than work, but I love it! The pencil is great for note taking and really Accurate. Arrived brand new in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: J Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great value, massive memory, fast
customer_reviews.text: Bought to update our slow old IPad this model is fast and has huge memory al at a good price (£499). Finger print works but not every time, my only gripe, but you can enter multiple prints which is a good feature as it is shared.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Norris

customer_reviews.title: A bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with the product and price. I was looking to upgrade from the iPad mini and this offer droppe. Happy Customet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all round
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on the 15th Feb got it on the 20th Feb even though it said March 5th to 15th. Very happy with this, did come with an American plug but they are cheap enough to replace. Would recommend after I saved over £100 on my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and quick.
customer_reviews.text: iPad bought for my wife. Very quick and user friendly and no problems with reliability. 3rd iPad bought over 8 years. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Big Stan

customer_reviews.title: Battery life /sad card
customer_reviews.text: I like the build quality / battery life does not last long enough . Could do with a sad card
customer_reviews.author: tcr

customer_reviews.title: Superb tablet with 120hz screen
customer_reviews.text: Bought on Black Friday for £449. Great tablet. Would recommend to replace older versions of ipad. 120hz screen is great and main reason why this was bought over air 2019 model.
customer_reviews.author: P Singh

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in December for a very good price and very pleased with the purchase. My first iPad but has become my main media device for watching Apple TV, Netflix, prime, sky go and bt sports. Really good for work stuff too and links brilliantly with my MacBook Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Paul V. Mullan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift to replace old iPad. It is lighter and has a greater potential
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Barley

customer_reviews.title: Great for great price
customer_reviews.text: Brought to replace another old iPad, perfect and brought large memory version at a great price on Black Friday deal.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: A good iPad and size screen.
customer_reviews.text: Bought my son for Christmas and he was pleased with it. So far so good . Paid a good price on Black Friday
customer_reviews.author: DonnaH

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I got a bit anxious when i figured out that the product is shipped from Hollywood,USA to uk and it got lost for awhile, however, i got it after very little delay. Right now i am very happy to have it, The iPad is perfect solution for sketching illustrations when outdoors. Overall, very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sonya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best thing since sliced bread. Allows me to use Apple iPen.
customer_reviews.author: Nagesh

customer_reviews.title: Fab replacement.
customer_reviews.text: My last iPad lasted nearly 10 years!!! So this replacement was well overdue. It’s so fast compared to the old one. Nice and light too.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from Apple
customer_reviews.text: I love this iPad - old one was a iPad 4 — the upgrades are great, the screen is very clear. Arrived all save & sound —- and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S M Richardson

customer_reviews.title: My life support
customer_reviews.text: Loving my new iPad which has such a smooth action, plenty of storage and loads of new features.
customer_reviews.author: Spashy

customer_reviews.title: Everything I want in an iPad !
customer_reviews.text: Very good discount for last years model, plenty of storage space. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lee

customer_reviews.title: so quick to load and packaged beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: No contact needed. Came day after ordering, so quick to load and packaged beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: anjihamm

customer_reviews.title: Brought sale so real bargain
customer_reviews.text: I brought this in the sale over Christmas period and for the money and speed is amazing absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: k sherman

customer_reviews.title: Good size for holidays
customer_reviews.text: Good size not too big. so far have had no issues
customer_reviews.author: Anne Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Apple I-Pas
customer_reviews.text: Use this lap top to replace my old model. Think it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Old Man

customer_reviews.title: Ipad Pro - surf and work as a pro
customer_reviews.text: it's an ipad PRO and it's great. nothing less and nothing more - amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Ivo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, thank you so much! After debating for weeks which model to buy I'm so glad we chose this, the picture and sound quality are incredible. The UK adapter included was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet on the market
customer_reviews.text: Delivery could have been faster but not a real issue. Device is awesome, love the colour, screen is out-of-this-world. Comes with included UK adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Slavy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing... use this everyday, delighted
customer_reviews.text: Charges quickly and holds charge Quick Can use it with Apple Pen, which is so useful.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Really love this iPad pro
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this iPad Pro it,S so easy to get on with
customer_reviews.author: VAL

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine, matched it with a detachable keyboard that wasn't an Apple (half the price) and is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ki Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use comprehensive tablet
customer_reviews.text: Not all of the data on my old iPad transferred to my new one. But otherwise the setup was dead easy.
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized iPad
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on Black Friday for a reduced price, fast delivery, and a faultless product as you’d expect from apple. I’d recommend purchasing a case for it beforehand as to prolong its pristine quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous, I am extremely pleased with the product which arrived very timely and very securely wrapped and presented.
customer_reviews.author: equaliser

customer_reviews.title: Performs well
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Just under 2 weeks in and no complaints. My boy loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Parf

customer_reviews.title: iPad pro
customer_reviews.text: Love this iPad, replacement for my iPad Air 2 which I was having problems with. This one is so much better to use.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Good ipad
customer_reviews.text: We have always had iPads - what we loved about this one is the screen size and of course the rose gold colour!!! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: YAN SHI

customer_reviews.title: What it says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, clarity excellent a good upgrade from my old original ipad
customer_reviews.author: Mr David McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this as it arrived in original box with all leads etc
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great seller
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic in every way it came early and the price couldn’t be beaten
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great price and delivered quickly too
customer_reviews.text: Great price, arrived promptly, really pleased with this purchase would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs T.

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bit heavier than I thought it would be, but nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More difficult than iPad 9.7 to organise
customer_reviews.text: Much more difficult to transfer folders an other files from pc to iPad 10.5
customer_reviews.author: Mr R A Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, reasonable price (used).
customer_reviews.text: As expected - however, it is still just an iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Mahonj

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and responsive.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t had anything that i disliked about it. It’s fast, responsive and a great substitute for the phone when it comes to watching Netflix or YouTube videos. Also the volume quality is really nice and really high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Andronic

customer_reviews.title: very happy (so far at least)
customer_reviews.text: non objection to quality, delivered at the short end of the estimation range. very happy (so far at least)
customer_reviews.author: A. Krecetovs

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Even though iPad cant replace your current laptop, it still a great productivity product as a complimentary product for computer. Light task (e.g. words, surfing internet, watching video) fast and responsive even in 2019
customer_reviews.author: Copimilo

customer_reviews.title: Apple Ipad
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the ipad lives up to its expectations
customer_reviews.author: Mike Welton

customer_reviews.title: So simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 78 year old mother. It's her lifeline and she absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Antony Rooke

customer_reviews.title: As long as it works it's great 🤯
customer_reviews.text: Was a fantastic purchase and combined with a first gen apple pencil is really great to sketch and produce digital illustration but mine packed up and screen went after two months currently waiting for a repair
customer_reviews.author: moobian

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time, easy to set up. Works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Miss K B

customer_reviews.title: Best price
customer_reviews.text: This was competitively priced and arrived within a few days. No problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN GARRETT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my wife and she absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: mr b grocott

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased . This was a replacement for an old iPad. The new one is much improved
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Grime

product_meta.title: Apple iPad Pro (10.5-inch, Wi-Fi, 256 GB) - Gold
feature_bullets: 10.5-inch Retina display with ProMotion, True Tone and wide colour
12MP back camera, 7MP FaceTime HD front camera
Up to 10 hours of battery life
Lightning connector for charging and accessories
iOS with Group FaceTime, shared augmented reality experiences, Screen Time and more
